languages.text: {n}Арбитр придает себе надменный и непокорный вид, но вы замечаете быстрый тревожный взгляд, брошенный в сторону префекта. Маршалу явно неуютно быть одному на линии вашего огня.{/n}

{n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Арбитр придает себе надменный и непокорный вид, но вы замечаете быстрый тревожный взгляд, брошенный в сторону префекта. Маршалу явно неуютно быть одному на линии вашего огня.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the Prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

{n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the Prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

{n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the Prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

{n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

{n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Arbitrator verströmt noch immer eine arrogante Gelassenheit, aber du bemerkst seinen besorgten Blick in Richtung des Präfekten. Der Marschall ist sichtlich verwirrt, dass sich dein Zorn nur auf ihn richtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Arbitrator verströmt noch immer eine arrogante Gelassenheit, aber du bemerkst seinen besorgten Blick in Richtung des Präfekten. Der Marschall ist sichtlich verwirrt, dass sich dein Zorn nur auf ihn richtet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous voyez l'arbitrator lancer un regard inquiet à la préfète. Derrière sa façade hautaine et imperturbable, il est clairement déconcerté d'être la seule cible de vos foudres.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous voyez l'arbitrator lancer un regard inquiet à la préfète. Derrière sa façade hautaine et imperturbable, il est clairement déconcerté d'être la seule cible de vos foudres.{/n}

languages.text: {n}アービトレイターは尊大で冷静沈着な態度を保っているが、あなたは彼が総監の方に向けた不安げな一瞥を見逃さなかった。将帥は、自分ひとりがあなたの追及の的になっていることに、明らかに居心地の悪さを感じている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}アービトレイターは尊大で冷静沈着な態度を保っているが、あなたは彼が総監の方に向けた不安げな一瞥を見逃さなかった。将帥は、自分ひとりがあなたの追及の的になっていることに、明らかに居心地の悪さを感じている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El Arbitrator mantiene un aire de impasibilidad altiva, pero captas la mirada preocupada que dirige a la prefecta. El mariscal está claramente incómodo por ser el único objetivo de tus ataques.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El Arbitrator mantiene un aire de impasibilidad altiva, pero captas la mirada preocupada que dirige a la prefecta. El mariscal está claramente incómodo por ser el único objetivo de tus ataques.{/n}

languages.text: {n}元帅保持着高傲、镇定的神态，但你注意到，他向行政官的方向投去了忧心忡忡的目光。很显然，你所有的怒火都集中在他身上，这让他很是困窘。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}元帅保持着高傲、镇定的神态，但你注意到，他向行政官的方向投去了忧心忡忡的目光。很显然，你所有的怒火都集中在他身上，这让他很是困窘。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yargıcı, soğukkanlılığını kibirli bir tavırla korusa da prefekte attığı endişeli bakış gözünden kaçmıyor. Miralay, hiddetinin tek nasipleneni olduğu için alenen rahatsızlık duyuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The Arbitrator maintains an air of haughty imperturbability, but you catch the worried glance he casts in the prefect's direction. The Marshal is clearly discomfited by being the sole focus of your fire.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yargıcı, soğukkanlılığını kibirli bir tavırla koruyor, ancak prefekte fırlattığı endişeli bakış gözünden kaçmıyor. Miralay, hiddetinin tek nasipleneni olduğu için alenen rahatsızlık duyuyor.{/n}
